caption:
This photograph portrays a classic, light grey Volkswagen Beetle parked on an urban street. The car's trunk is prominent in the foreground, bearing a Connecticut license plate labeled "JK-1612." An emblem reading "Volkswagen" adorns the lower part of the trunk. The vehicle is rounded with distinct, circular tail lights and a shining metallic bumper.

On the left side of the image, there's a traditional black fire hydrant near the curb. Beyond the car, the street extends into a tree-lined city block, marked by a sidewalk bordered with metal fences and a series of brownstone townhouses that suggest a residential neighborhood.

In the background, two individuals—one closer to the camera, possibly playing or skipping, and another further away, walking—can be seen on the sidewalk. The scene conveys a quiet, daylit moment in a typical urban setting. The atmosphere is calm, with overcast lighting that softens the colors in the photograph.
title: High risk parking in greenwich village, lower Manhattan
